page.title: 13PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: There are three{public houses} which are all sited along the main{ {A3057.}From south to north they are The Duke's Head, The Malthouse and The Bear and Ragged Staff Inn. The two latter pubs, as well as providing food and drink, contribute a great deal to the lives of those living in the villages of Timsbury and Michelmersh. The Malthouse, for example, holds events such as fetes, barbecues and the ever familiar car-boot sales, during which money is raised for various deserving causes and individuals in the area. A racing track for miniature, radio-controlled cars is being laid in the orchard. The Bear and Ragged Staff hold similar events to help the handicapped children of Romsey and is the venue for the Pumpkin Club.
